summary: I need to see Sansa and Jon’s reaction to gendryxarya like... I need it. Bonus points if the hound has a reaction too lmao
question: I need to see Sansa and Jon’s reaction to gendryxarya like... I need it. Bonus points if the hound has a reaction too lmao
answer: anon!!! i need this! jon’s reaction more than anything! the look on his face when he realizes is going to be timeless. the show better not gloss over this and just accept it as a given that he knows. i really do hope it’s a post-battle, happy-to-both-still-be-alive kiss that catches everyone off guard. and gendry’s too far gone/happy that arya’s alive to care what anyone thinks. knowing maisie and sophie, sansa’s reaction will be cute/supportive, at least i hope so, considering the growth there. davos is going to be ecstatic if exasperated with “clovis” for yet again doing something else he’s not supposed to. the hound is going to be a dick about it. it’s funny, i even want to see cersei’s reaction, see her face when she realizes that robert got what he wanted in a way. she hated the memory of lyanna because robert loved it more than he ever loved cersei. so after everything she’s done since, it’d be a sort of poetic justice for her to have to see it happening in front of her, but for real this time.

blog.name: rorylgilmore
blog.title: Copper Boom
blog.description: Clarisa. ESFJ. Period drama junkie. Sansa Stark and Gilmore Girls enthusiast. Sidebar: Gilmoresgifs.

summary: Top 5 Sansa moments from the books!
question: Top 5 Sansa moments from the books!
answer:
Thank you! ^__^  In no particular order: 

  • When she builds the snow castle that is to be a very detailed replica of Winterfell at the end of ASOS.
  • Sansa at blackwater; Helping Lancel, calming the women and children and “..If i’m ever a queen, i will make them love me” :’).
  • Her escape from King’s Landing(which the show didn’t do any justice to, sadly).
  • Her descent from the Eyrie in AFFC (with Robert in tow) where she displays remarkable courage in making it across the narrow icy strip: “His hand was shaking. Oh, no, Alayne thought. Please. Not here. Not now. Alayne took Robert’s gloved hand in her own to stop his shaking. “Sweetrobin,” she said, “I’m scared. Hold my hand, and help me get across. I know you’re not afraid.”He looked at her, his pupils small dark pinpricks in eyes as big and white as eggs. “I’m not?”“Not you. You’re my winged knight, Ser Sweetrobin.”“The Winged Knight could fly,” Robert whispered..She helped the boy dismount, and hand in hand they walked out onto the bare stone saddle, their cloaks snapping and flapping behind them. All around was empty air and sky, the ground falling away sharply to either side. There was ice underfoot, and broken stones just waiting to turn an ankle, and the wind was howling fiercely. It sounds like a wolf, thought Sansa. A ghost wolf, big as mountains. And then they were on the other side. :’). 
  • And this moment from her TWOW sample chapter:  “A lady’s armor is her courtesy. Alayne could feel the blood rushing to her face. No tears, she prayed. Please, please, I must not cry. “As you wish, ser. And now if you will excuse me, Littlefinger’s bastard must find her lord father and let him know that you have come, so we can begin the tourney on the morrow.” And may your horse stumble, Harry the Heir, so you fall on your stupid head in your first tilt.” ( I love this Sansa with all my heart and i miss herr)

tags: i saw one of her fanarts being passed around and i was annoyed
can you people read the tags and realise the art is paedophilic in nature?
i wish we blocked these paedo shippers instead of reblogging their sansa content
summary: There is this PetyrxSansa shipped who appears in the tag on occasion and she is honestly so disgusting. The things she writes...
question: There is this PetyrxSansa shipped who appears in the tag on occasion and she is honestly so disgusting. The things she writes make my skin crawl. She also pretends to be a huge Sansa fan, but hates on her often. Just ugh. Today she posted something again... time to block
answer: I love and hate how I know who you’re talking about. That person probably read Lolita and shed tears Humbert. She loves drawing what is basically child pornography, she’s not one of those paedo shippers who attempt to age Sansa up in their fanart. She thinks Sansa is the worst for not being nice to Tyrion yet the fandom treats her like an authority on Sansa.

summary: honestly even the possibility of sansa dying makes no fucking sense because of so many reasons but the biggest is that she is...
body:
honestly even the possibility of sansa dying makes no fucking sense because of so many reasons but the biggest is that she is the ONLY Stark fighting for Northern Independence.

that is what we see on screen. killing her after that build up from last episode just doesn’t click for me.

tags: otp: a song of ice and fire
summary: I’ll preface this post by saying that I’m a firm believer of Sansa Stark and Aegon VI Targaryen/Young Griff ending up together...
body:
I’ll preface this post by saying that I’m a firm believer of Sansa Stark and Aegon VI Targaryen/Young Griff ending up together in the books. Whether it’s for a short time or whether they end up being endgame, I do think they will be a couple. There’s ample evidence in the books of this relationship coming to fruition (x, x, x, x).

I know it’s a given that the Dance of Dragons 2.0 will happen (GRRM basically said so) and it’s safe to assume that it will be between Daenerys Targaryen and Aegon VI Targaryen. But that being said, it’s up in the air what the actual Dance will be about. Personally, I think Aegon is a Blackfyre pretender (but he is unaware of that fact) but this post isn’t meant to discuss his true identity.

There was a time when I used to think that Aegon would be killed by Dany (slayer of lies prophecy), but now I’m starting to think that perhaps Dany doesn’t kill him after all. Why? Because Aegon will give up his claim to the throne.

In the show, Sansa has dragonflies on a lot of her costume designs. Dragonflies are associated with Duncan Targaryen (Prince of Dragonflies). Prince Duncan gave up his claim to the throne because of his love for a woman. Likewise, I think Aegon will give up his claim to the throne in order to live and be with Sansa instead. 

The show didn’t include Aegon or anything to do with the Dance of Dragons 2.0 but I think that has a lot to do with the fact that Aegon won’t be on the throne in the end, and not because he isn’t important at all.

tags: a song of ice and fire
a knight of the seven kingdoms
summary:
I noticed Sansa said we'd never bow to anyone else again.
As in, the north doesn't has to bow, not for Daenerys, neither is...
body:
I noticed Sansa said we’d never bow to anyone else again.

As in, the north doesn’t has to bow, not for Daenerys, neither is Sansa expecting them to bow for her.

She puts the people, her family members and herself on the same level. She isn’t insisting that her people bend the knee or bow to her.

She does everything she can to keep her people safe and alive and yes, makes sure they have enough food since they need that to stay alive.

She takes up the responsibilities that come with a position of power, yet she doesn’t act like she is worth more than others.

That is what being Lady of Winterfell is to her. It isn’t just about some fancy title, nice clothes or power.

summary: This must be said, Daenerys is not jealous of Sansa. Daenerys has whole armies of people that love and respect her. Grey Worm...
body: This must be said, Daenerys is not jealous of Sansa. Daenerys has whole armies of people that love and respect her. Grey Worm and Missandei gave up their whole lives to live in a foreign land where people have them because of their skin color because they love and believe in her. Stop with this bullshit already. And that’s the tea.

reblog.comment: This must be said, Daenerys is not jealous of Sansa. Daenerys has whole armies of people that love and respect her. Grey Worm and Missandei gave up their whole lives to live in a foreign land where people have them because of their skin color because they love and believe in her. Stop with this bullshit already. And that’s the tea.
